mapper.insert: insert into easybuy_user(loginName, userName, password, sex, identityCode, email, mobile) values (#{loginName}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{identityCode}, #{email}, #{mobile})
mapper.select: select id, loginName, userName, password, sex, identityCode, email, mobile from easybuy_user where loginName = #{loginName}
select id, loginName, userName, password, sex, identityCode, email, mobile from easybuy_user where mobile = #{mobile}
select id, loginName, userName, password, sex, identityCode, email, mobile from easybuy_user where email = #{email}

select u.id, loginName, userName, password, sex, identityCode, email, mobile, roleId, roleName from easybuy_user u,easybuy_role r WHERE r.id=u.roleId and loginName = #{loginName} and password = #{password}

SELECT u.id, loginName, userName, `password`, sex, identityCode, email, mobile, roleId, isDel, createTime, roleName FROM easybuy_user u , easybuy_role r WHERE u.roleId = r.id AND u.isDel = 0
and u.userName like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND roleId > 1
AND roleId = #{roleId}
ORDER BY u.id
SELECT u.id, loginName, userName, password, sex, identityCode, email, mobile, roleId, isDel, createTime, roleName from easybuy_user u, easybuy_role r where u.id = #{id} AND u.roleId = r.id
